segment.source: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: During troubleshooting, you may sometimes find it necessary to restart or reset the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: During troubleshooting, you may sometimes find it necessary to restart or reset the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Restarting the MED-V workspace is basically the same as restarting a physical computer.
segment.target: Restarting the MED-V workspace is basically the same as restarting a physical computer.

segment.source: Resetting the MED-V workspace reruns first time setup and deletes all data that is stored in the virtual machine.
segment.target: Resetting the MED-V workspace reruns first time setup and deletes all data that is stored in the virtual machine.

segment.source: Because all stored data is deleted, you typically should only reset the MED-V workspace to resolve the most serious troubleshooting issues, or to restore a previously working MED-V workspace back to a working state.
segment.target: Because all stored data is deleted, you typically should only reset the MED-V workspace to resolve the most serious troubleshooting issues, or to restore a previously working MED-V workspace back to a working state.

segment.source: For information about how to open the MED-V Administration Toolkit, see Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit.
segment.target: For information about how to open the MED-V Administration Toolkit, see Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit.

segment.source: Restarting a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Restarting a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click Restart MED-V Workspace.
segment.target: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click Restart MED-V Workspace.

segment.source: A dialog window opens in which you must confirm that you want to restart the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: A dialog window opens in which you must confirm that you want to restart the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Click Restart.
segment.target: Click Restart.

segment.source: Any published applications that are running or redirected web sites that are open will be closed when the MED-V workspace restarts.
segment.target: Any published applications that are running or redirected web sites that are open will be closed when the MED-V workspace restarts.

segment.source: Resetting a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Resetting a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click Reset MED-V Workspace.
segment.target: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click Reset MED-V Workspace.

segment.source: A dialog window opens in which you must confirm that you want to reset the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: A dialog window opens in which you must confirm that you want to reset the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Warning
segment.target: Warning

segment.source: Resetting the MED-V workspace causes first time setup to run again, and thus reloads the original virtual hard disk.
segment.target: Resetting the MED-V workspace causes first time setup to run again, and thus reloads the original virtual hard disk.

segment.source: All data that is stored in the MED-V workspace since first time setup was originally run will be deleted.
segment.target: All data that is stored in the MED-V workspace since first time setup was originally run will be deleted.

segment.source: Click Reset.
segment.target: Click Reset.

segment.source: Any published applications that are running or redirected web sites that are open will be closed when the MED-V workspace resets.
segment.target: Any published applications that are running or redirected web sites that are open will be closed when the MED-V workspace resets.

segment.target: Related topics
